title: golem-powers:create-pr - Adapt create-pr skill from Union
description: Adapt the create-pr skill pattern from Union. This skill automates: push current branch, create PR against target branch, with proper title/body formatting. Follows golem-powers dual execution pattern.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create SKILL.md with frontmatter: name: create-pr, execute: scripts/create-pr.sh
- Pushes current branch to origin with -u flag
- Creates PR using gh pr create
- Outputs Markdown with PR URL and details
- Already on main/dev branch: warn and exit
- PR already exists: show existing PR URL
Test: Create a test branch, run skill, verify PR created
Commit changes with message: feat/fix: [STORY-ID] description
